reference: May, Robert M. "Simple mathematical models with very complicated dynamics." Nature, Vol. 261, June 10, 1976, pp. 459-467; reprinted in The Theory of Chaotic Attractors, pp. 85-93. Index entries for sequences related to Lyndon words
program: L(n, k) = sumdiv(gcd(n,k), d, moebius(d) * binomial(n/d, k/d) );
a051841 n = (sum $ zipWith (\u v -> gcd 2 u * a008683 u * 2 ^ v)
ds $ reverse ds) `div` (2 * n) where ds = a027750_row n
